Filer <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000;" face="Wingdings">&#168;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;Smaller
Reporting Company <font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">x</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Indicate
by check mark whether the registrant is a shell company. (As defined<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font>in Rule 12b-2 of the
Exchange Act.)<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>YES&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000;" face="Wingdings">&#168;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;NO&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline;" face="Wingdings">x</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
aggregate market value of the registrant&#8217;s voting stock held by non-affiliates
(based on the closing sale price of the registrant&#8217;s Common Stock on the NASDAQ
Capital Market, and for the purpose of this computation only, on the assumption
that all of the registrant&#8217;s directors and officers are affiliates as well as
one party filing on Form SC 13-G) was approximately $4,014,417 as of December
31, 2008.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of
September 15, 2009, the number of shares of the registrant&#8217;s Class A Common
Stock outstanding was 8,035,739.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <hr style="MARGIN-TOP: -5px; COLOR: #000000" noshade size="1">

    </div>

                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Controls
      and Procedures</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">22</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="12%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="82%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="#ccffcc">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">PART
      III</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">23</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      10.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Directors
      and Executive Officers of the Registrant</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">23</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="#ccffcc">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      11.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Executive
      Compensation</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">27</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      12.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Security
      Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners and Management</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">36</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="#ccffcc">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      13.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Certain
      Relationships and Related Transactions</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">39</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      14.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Principal
      Accountant Fees and Services</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">40</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="#ccffcc">
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="12%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="82%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">PART
      IV</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="82%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">40</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="#ccffcc">
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="12%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Item
      15.</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Exhibits,
      Financial Statement Schedules and Reports on Form 8-K</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">40</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>

      to Consolidated Financial Statements</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">F-1</font></div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                                                                    <td valign="top" width="12%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

                                                                    </td>

                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>

                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%">
                                                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">See&#160;Exhibits</font></div>

    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
